headline: 1 Stock to Buy, 1 Stock to Sell This Week: Shopify, Occidental Petroleum
summary: • CPI inflation, retail sales, producer prices, and more earnings will be in focus this week. • Shopify stands out as a buy, particularly with the holiday season around the corner. • Occidental Petroleum’s challenging landscape makes it one to approach with caution. • Looking for more actionable trade ideas? headline: What To Expect From October's 2024 Inflation Report
summary: The upcoming October CPI report is expected to show a modest rise in inflation. Read why investors should monitor news-driven sell-offs in the drug sector.
